game.name: The King's Bargain
game.genres: 어드벤처, 인디, RPG, 전략, 앞서 해보기
game.categories: 싱글 플레이어, Steam 도전 과제, 카메라 움직임 조정, 음량 개별 조정, 수시 저장, 스테레오 사운드, 서라운드 사운드, 통계, Steam 순위표, 가족 공유
game.shortDescription: A king's foolish bargain. A queen's final curse. A kingdom's rotten soul and a world in ruins. In this gothic survival, RPG-Strategy, manage your team, sanity, and resources to fight the blight that consumes your kingdom.
game.shortDescriptionEn: A king's foolish bargain. A queen's final curse. A kingdom's rotten soul and a world in ruins. In this gothic survival, RPG-Strategy, manage your team, sanity, and resources to fight the blight that consumes your kingdom.
